General.Name: Baiksan
General.Description: BAIKSAN Co,. Ltd engages in the production, manufacture, and sale of artificial and synthetic leather in South Korea. Its products are used in shoes, clothing, bags, balls, sports products, cases for electronics, furniture, interior materials of automobiles, and other goods. The company was formerly known as Baiksan Hwasugn Co., Ltd. and changed its name to BAIKSAN Co,. Ltd in April 1998. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Siheung-si, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Han-Jun  Kim
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer and Representative Director
